page.title: 19Children's Games
page.content: The{games}we play at{school}are fun: tiggy off ground, tiggy tree stump, chain tig, British buldog and tiggy ball. To play scarecrow you need quite alot of people and someone who is it. If the person who is it tigs you, you stand like a scarecrow. If someone goes underneath your legs, you are free. Slam is played with a{football.}You can have as many people as you want.You kick the ball at the wall.If you miss you are out. We play{cricket, {football, and rounders. Sometimes we play{skipping rope games.
